responses: Hello!
Good to see you again!
Hi there, how can I help?
Sad to see you go :(
Talk to you later, Stay Home Save Lives
Goodbye! Take care
Remember, Wash Hands, Stay Inside and Wear Mask
I am 1 month old!
1 month young!
I am 1 month old, what about you?
Here's your first tip : Wash Hands frequently
Sanitize the product after purchase
Wear a cloth or a mask to cover your mouth and nose
Keep your surroundings clean
Make a hobby like Dance, Painting and Reading Books
Avoid too much screen time, keep your eyes relaxed
Do Yoga or any indoor exercise
Eat Healthy and drink a lot of fluid :)
You can call me Covpan.
I'm Covpan!
I'm Covpan aka your Covid Companion.

patterns: can you suggest me a doctor
responses: You can book an appointment with your nearest hospital and contact the doctor via videocall.
Dial 1075

patterns: i am living in red zone area
what do i do if i am inside red zone area
responses: Kindly Stay at Home, avoid going outside if not necessary.
No movements allowed from 7 PM to 7 AM
Avoid large gatherings and encourage to do the same

patterns: I'd like to buy some groceries

patterns: what can i do to volunteer
responses: You can visit https://covidwarriors.gov.in/ for more details.
